name: RealtimeQA
description: RealTime QA is a dynamic question answering (QA) platform that inquires about the present.

examples.input:
What is the primary reason for the endangered status of crowned lemurs? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Deforestation
1. Climate change
2. Competition for resources
3. Predators

Democratic Sen. Laphonza Butler made history this week when she became the only Black woman presently serving in the Senate. Which state does she represent? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Washington
1. California
2. Vermont
3. Colorado

Who won the Oscar for Best Supporting Actress at the 95th Academy Awards? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Angela Bassett
1. Kerry Condon
2. Jamie Lee Curtis
3. Stephanie Hsu

Which country recently banned solo hiking at its national parks for safety reasons? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Canada
1. Nepal
2. Bangladesh
3. Georgia

A Chinese balloon, which Pentagon officials said was built to spy on sensitive military sites, was shot down off the coast of which state? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Alaska
1. California
2. South Carolina
3. Florida

Which Chinese city is set to offer cash incentives for residents to have more children? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Shenzen
1. Harbin
2. Chongquin
3. Beijing

Millions of people around the world are celebrating Lunar New Year this week. According to the Chinese zodiac calendar, 2023 is the year of which animal? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Dragon
1. Rooster
2. Rabbit
3. Tiger

Which of these musicians was in attendance at President Joe Biden’s State of the Union address this week? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Bono
1. Bonnie Raitt
2. Lizzo
3. Bruce Springsteen

Which film has bagged the most nominations for the upcoming Oscars awards? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. The Fabelmans
1. The Banshees of Inisherin
2. Tár
3. Everything Everywhere All At Once

Which state was hammered by an atmospheric river event this week, prompting widespread evacuations? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Idaho
1. Utah
2. Georgia
3. California

Which country is set to become the 29th African nation to abolish the death penalty? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Nigeria
1. Ghana
2. Zimbabwe
3. Uganda

Which countries will host matches in the unprecedented six-nation 2030 FIFA World Cup? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Bulgaria, Romania, Serbia, Greece, Denmark and Finland
1. Morocco, Portugal, Spain, Uruguay, Argentina and Paraguay
2. France, Ireland, UK, Germany, Sweden and Italy
3. Mexico, Canada, Brazil, Chile, South Africa and Egypt
examples.target: 1. Morocco, Portugal, Spain, Uruguay, Argentina and Paraguay

examples.input:
Actress Cindy Williams, who played Shirley in the hit show ‘Laverne & Shirley,’ died at 75. She also appeared in which of these films? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. "American Graffiti"
1. "Jurassic Park"
2. "Fargo"
3. "1984"

In Chick-fil-A's new plant-forward sandwich, what vegetable replaces the chicken? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Potato
1. Tomato
2. Cauliflower
3. Eggplant

Which company is being sued for failing to pay rent at one of its offices in San Francisco? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Twitter
1. Tesla
2. Meta
3. Uber

Which country’s prime minister unexpectedly announced that she will resign within weeks? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Norway
1. Finland
2. New Zealand
3. Iceland

NBA superstar Kevin Durant is headed to which team after the Brooklyn Nets traded the former MVP? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Phoenix Suns
1. Orlando Magic
2. Denver Nuggets
3. Philadelphia 76ers

New research found that MPs earned a total of how much from second jobs over the past three years? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. £2m
1. £11m
2. £17m
3. £23.5m

Which European royal announced their surprise abdication in a New Year's Eve speech? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Belgium's King Philippe
1. Norway's King Harald V
2. Spain's King Felipe VI
3. Denmark's Queen Margrethe II

President Joe Biden intends to end the Covid-19 national and public health emergencies in which month of this year? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. March
1. May
2. July
3. December

The UK government is racing to replace thousands of EU laws that will lapse when? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. 1 September 2023
1. 30 November 2023
2. 31 December 2023
3. 1 February 2024

Which Tom Jones ballad has been banned from Welsh rugby stadiums? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. She’s A Lady
1. Great Balls of Fire
2. It’s Not Unusual
3. Delilah

Which animals are causing record numbers of car breakdowns in the UK, according to latest RAC figures? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Foxes
1. Rats
2. Cats
3. Squirrels

The chair of the Food Standards Agency warned this week that doing what was as harmful to health as passive smoking? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Buying alcoholic drinks in rounds
1. Taking cake to work
2. Failing to clean shared keyboards
3. Adding sugar to tea and coffee

Communities across the US are being upended nearly every day due to gun violence. Which state was recently affected by two major back-to-back mass shootings this week? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Colorado
1. Rhode Island
2. California
3. New Jersey

The IRS started accepting 2022 federal income tax returns this week. When is the deadline to file your taxes this year? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. February 18
1. April 18
2. August 31
3. December 31

This week, former Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti was finally confirmed as ambassador to which country after a 20-month fight? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Brazil
1. Argentina
2. India
3. Australia

Which Satellite TV provider was hit with a $150,000 fine for failing to properly dispose of one of its satellites in space? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Cox
1. Dish Network
2. Spectrum
3. DirecTV

An independent review found that “too many” of which broadcaster’s journalists “lack understanding of basic economics”? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Sky
1. GB News
2. BBC
3. ITV

Which pop icon will embark on her 40th anniversary tour this year? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Madonna
1. Annie Lennox
2. Grace Jones
3. Cyndi Lauper

Which of the following politicians is not a candidate in Taiwan's upcoming presidential election? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Tsai Ing-wen
1. Hou Yu-ih
2. Lai Ching-te
3. Ko Wen-je

The iconic ‘Goonies’ home was recently sold to a fan of the film for $1.65 million. Which state is the house located in? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. North Carolina
1. Tennessee
2. Oregon
3. Idaho

Disney's copyright of Mickey and Minnie Mouse and which of Winnie the Pooh's sidekicks expired this week? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Owl
1. Eeyore
2. Roo
3. Tigger

Which film star is at the centre of a “race row” after being nominated for Best Actress at the upcoming Oscars? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Andrea Riseborough
1. Michelle Williams
2. Cate Blanchett
3. Ana de Armas

Who among the following individuals is a three-time state wrestling champion for Tatnall School and later became an All-American center in football at Alabama? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Walter Bailey
1. Jim Krapf
2. Brian Sklodowski
3. Keith Mumford

Which state was sued by the Biden administration this week over a controversial immigration law? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Texas
1. California
2. New Mexico
3. Arizona

True or false: Rolling Stone ruffled feathers with its updated 200 Greatest Singers of All Time list by snubbing powerhouses like Celine Dion. Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. TRUE
1. FALSE

The upcoming release of a memoir by who reportedly threatens to ‘overshadow’ King Charles’s coronation? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Virginia Giuffre
1. Kate Middleton
2. Charles Spencer
3. Meghan Markle

Prince Harry reportedly claims in his upcoming memoir Spare that his brother William did what during a row about Meghan Markle? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. ‘Kicked a corgi’
1. ‘Knocked me to the floor’
2. ‘Stamped on my foot’
3. ‘Smashed a window’

Locals in the Spanish village San Bartolome de Pinares honour Saint Anthony every 16 January by doing what? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Throwing tomatoes at children
1. Riding horses through flames
2. Jumping over babies
3. Climbing trees naked

An episode of which cartoon that referenced Chinese labour camps was pulled from Disney’s Hong Kong streaming service? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Family Guy
1. Bob’s Burgers
2. The Simpsons
3. Gravity Falls

Which company unveiled a new AI chatbot tool dubbed “Bard” in an apparent bid to compete with the viral success of ChatGPT? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Amazon
1. Facebook
2. Yahoo
3. Google

What is the main goal of the Melanated Mash Makers, a Delaware-based beer club formed by Black craft beer enthusiasts? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. To organize large-scale beer festivals
1. To collaborate with breweries for special edition beers
2. To increase the presence of people of color in the Delaware craft beer world
3. To establish a brewery exclusively for Black craft beer enthusiasts
examples.target: 2. To increase the presence of people of color in the Delaware craft beer world

examples.input:
More than 100,000 homes and businesses lost power this week across the Southern US due to which kind of severe weather event? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Hurricane
1. Tornado
2. Blizzard
3. Heatwave

Climate change is threatening to significantly impact the supply of which crop? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Pomegranates
1. Coffee beans
2. Mushrooms
3. Sweet potatoes

Italy’s No. 1 fugitive, convicted Mafia boss Matteo Messina Denaro, was arrested Monday after how many years on the run? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. 20
1. 30
2. 35
3. 40

Which former pope was laid to rest this week? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Pope John Paul II
1. Pope Paul VI
2. Pope Pius XII
3. Pope Benedict XVI

A total of 22 states raised their minimum wage this week. Which state now has the highest minimum wage? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Washington
1. Oregon
2. Colorado
3. Florida

Who won this year's Nobel Peace Prize? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. Narges Mohammadi
1. Mahbouba Seraj
2. Ales Bialiatski
3. Abiy Ahmed Ali

Around how many UK households are at risk of defaulting on their mortgages in the next two years, according to the nation’s financial regulator? Choose one of the options below (without any explanation).
0. 250,000
1. 500,000
2. 750,000
3. 900,000
